name: Angry World War 2 FREE
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: on iOS 6.1 game can crash if network connection is unavailable, this will be fixed soon!

Addictive physics game in the realities of World War II with stylish 3D graphics.
Destroying military buildings, shooting to paratroopers and airplanes!
Different weapons to choose from: grenades, tanks and airplanes.

This is full, free version of Angry World War 2 game, the only difference is that it supports iAd. If you prefer, you can get version without iAd.

- unique 3D graphics
- over 50 different battles in over 10 countries
- two fractions to choose from: Allies or Axis
- tanks, grenades, airplanes
- 3 game modes including campaign
- multiplayer on one device in paratroopers mode
- global leaderboards vía Game Center
- fantastic physics and ragdolls

Have you dreamed about Angry Birds in World War II realities? You will be delighted with Angry World War 2!

You may want to check gameplay video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RdVfurwGlog
